------=_NextPart_000_00AD_01C1C890.DD3701A0
Content-Type: text/plain;
	charset="iso-8859-1"
Content-Transfer-Encoding: quoted-printable

He sees the the external sensore were brough back. He connects some wires, =
fixing the internal sensors. He gets up, brushing himself off. "Hmm, organi=
c beast modes will help. As for the rest of us who prefer mechanical modes,=
 we'll have to inselate ourselves with the same technology."He checks the s=
ensors."Damn! The ship looks like slag. But could have been worse, we could=
 have crashed on Quintessa, or into Unicron."
He laughed at the joke only h=
e, and maybe history buffs, would get.

{Talos}
Deck 2, CR Chamber room

Ta=
los had moved through the damaged ship and ascended the stairs to deck two =
where the main generators and CR chambers were located. After recieving Sun=
hawks and Hot Rod's reports he nodded before moving to a communications hub=
 that wasn't sparking and turned on ship wide broadcasting, "Sensors have d=
etected massive energon readings outside the ship, all personnel should rep=
ort to the CR Chamber bay for alterate form protection, do not stray far fr=
om the ship before you have done this."

Closing the channel he moved to a =
console and began typing, on the top of the ship a hatch slid open freeing =
an extending pole that began scanning the surrounding area for compatible f=
orms. After several seconds the machine stayed at a low hum holding a list =
of available alternate forms.

Entering one of the CR chambers he let the n=
anobots change his casing to more suit the transformation to beast mode. Wh=
en the pod opened again Talos stepped out in his mammoth form. "Talos, MAXI=
MIZE!" He spoke as his body adjusted back to it's robotic form. Opening the=
 comm to the bridge again he spoke, "Might want to repair that destroyed vi=
ewing portal there guys, the damage has probably rendered the bridges prote=
ctive fields offline or at least unstable though from the time frame I'm gu=
essing unstable so be careful don't want you guys slipping into stasis lock=
..."
